thread.title: The Seven Best Hotels to Stay at during the Tennis U.S. Open [SLIDESHOW]
thread.title_full: The Seven Best Hotels to Stay at during the Tennis U.S. Open [SLIDESHOW]

author: Rebekah Bell
title: The Seven Best Hotels to Stay at during the Tennis U.S. Open [SLIDESHOW]
text:
Rebekah Bell AUGUST 18, 2015 
As fans prepare to turn out in droves for the U.S. Open of tennis—to be held August 31 through September 13 at the USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center in Flushing, N.Y.—one question remains front and center: Where are the best places to stay during the tournament? Our roundup gives an overview of seven hotels that provide ultimate comfort and close proximity to the games.
